name: Create new transaction for the Commercial Clients from the 'Transactions' page

steps.name: Click on the 'Transactions' button from the sidebar menu
Enter the transaction name into the 'Transaction name' input field
Click on the 'Associated client or prospect' dropdown field
Click on the 'Transaction type' dropdown field
Select the 'Renewal' option inside the 'Transaction type' dropdown field
Click on the 'Finish' button to complete the transaction creation
